stories.title: Microphone Recording
stories.description: As a user, I can record meetings using my microphone
acceptance_criteria: Start/stop recording with clear visual feedback

stories.title: System Audio Recording
stories.description: As a user, I can record system audio (for online calls)
acceptance_criteria: Capture system audio via screen share

stories.title: Upload Recording
stories.description: As a user, I can upload pre-recorded audio/video files
acceptance_criteria: Accept audio and video file formats

stories.title: Hebrew Transcription (Ivrit AI)
stories.description: As a user, my Hebrew recordings are transcribed using Ivrit AI

stories.title: English Transcription (Whisper)
stories.description: As a user, my English recordings are transcribed using OpenAI Whisper

stories.title: Transcript Display
stories.description: As a user, I can view transcripts with speaker segments

stories.title: Session Management
stories.description: As a user, I can manage my meeting sessions

stories.title: Hebrew RTL Interface
stories.description: As a Hebrew speaker, the interface is RTL and in Hebrew

stories.title: User Authentication
stories.description: As a user, I can sign up, sign in, and sign out
acceptance_criteria: Protected routes redirect to sign in

stories.title: Protected Dashboard
stories.description: As a user, I can only access the dashboard when authenticated
acceptance_criteria: Redirect to sign in if not authenticated
Show user email in header when signed in

stories.title: Transcript Correction with GPT-4o
stories.description: As a user, I can correct transcript errors using AI assistance
acceptance_criteria: Button to request AI correction on transcript
GPT-4o processes transcript for grammar/spelling fixes
Show diff between original and corrected

stories.title: Manual Transcript Editing
stories.description: As a user, I can manually edit transcript segments

stories.title: Meeting Summary Generation
stories.description: As a user, I get an AI-generated summary of my meeting
acceptance_criteria: Display summary on meeting detail page

stories.title: Action Item Extraction
stories.description: As a user, action items are extracted from my meeting
acceptance_criteria: Extract tasks with assignees and deadlines

stories.title: Local Meeting Search
stories.description: As a user, I can search within a single meeting transcript
acceptance_criteria: Search input on meeting detail page

stories.title: Global Semantic Search
stories.description: As a user, I can search across all my meetings
acceptance_criteria: Click result to navigate to meeting

stories.title: Entity Extraction
stories.description: As a user, named entities are extracted from my meetings
acceptance_criteria: Show extracted entities on meeting page

stories.title: Auto-generated Tags
stories.description: As a user, meetings are auto-tagged based on content

stories.title: Manual Tags
stories.description: As a user, I can manually add tags to meetings

stories.title: Meeting Q&A Chat
stories.description: As a user, I can ask questions about my meeting
acceptance_criteria: Chat interface on meeting detail page
AI responses based on transcript context

stories.title: Cross-Meeting Q&A
stories.description: As a user, I can ask questions across all my meetings
